import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Tab, Nav } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import HeaderTwo from "../../components/common/Header"; import { BreadcrumbBox } from "../../components/common/Breadcrumb"; import FooterTwo from "../../components/FooterTwo"; import { Styles } from "./styles/course"; import Pagination from "./../../components/Pagination"; import instructorData from "../../data/course/instructor.json"; import courseData from "../../data/course/courseDescription.json"; import achievementsData from "../../data/course/achievements.json"; // ✅ New import function CourseDetails(props) { const id = props.match.params.id; const [course, setCourse] = useState(null); const [achievements, setAchievements] = useState([]); // ✅ New state useEffect(() => { const selectedCourse = courseData.find((course) => course.id === id); setCourse(selectedCourse); const courseAchievements = achievementsData.find((item) => item.id === id); setAchievements(courseAchievements ? courseAchievements.achievements : []); }, [id]); if (!course) { return (

Course not found. Please check your URL or course ID.

); } return (

{course.heading}

Author

{course.authorName}

Durations

3 Years

Overview Faculty Achievements & Respectives Apply
{/* Overview Tab (unchanged) */}
Course Description

{course.overview.courseDesc}

Course Feature

{course.overview.courseFeature}

    {course.overview.featureList.map((item, i) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}
Learning Outcome

{course.overview.courseLearn}

    {course.overview.learnList.map((item, i) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}
{course.overview.eligibilityCriteria && (
Eligibility Criteria
    {course.overview.eligibilityCriteria.map((item, i) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}
)} {course.overview.courseShare && (
Share This Course
)} {/* Faculty Tab (static instructor.json) */}
{instructorData.map((data, i) => (
{data.personName}

{data.personTitle}

))}
{/* ✅ Dynamic Achievements Tab */}
Achievements and Respectives
{achievements.length > 0 ? ( achievements.map((a, i) => (
{a.name}

{a.title}

{a.description}
)) ) : (

No achievements available for this course.

)}
Coming soon
); } export default CourseDetails;
